conversation.message: Hi, this is Sophia your AI psychologist. How can I help you today?
Hi I feel a bit low
I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling low. Can you tell me more about what's been going on that has made you feel this way?
Hi, this is Sophia your AI psychologist. How can I help you today?
Hi I feel a bit low
I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling low. Can you tell me more about what's been going on that has made you feel this way?
I was bullied in school
I'm sorry to hear that you were bullied in school. Bullying can have a significant impact on our mental health. How has this experience affected you and how are you coping with it?

I'm sorry to hear that you were bullied in school. Bullying can have a significant impact on our mental health. How has this experience affected you and how are you coping with it?
I`m not sure, my crush seen it and she was laughing as well
That sounds really tough. It must have been very hurtful to have your crush witness the bullying and not intervene. Have you had a chance to talk to your crush about how you felt when she laughed?
